str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Sinning, sinful, depraved, detestable. From hamartano; sinful, i.e. A sinner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
